name: The Noise
description:
This is a story of a single gunshot.

What exactly happens is up to your imagination.

  • You are a hunter.
  • You are the grandma.
  • You are a murderer, and grandma is your partner in crime.
  • You are the bird, and you hate gunshots.
  • You are the tree, standing in the middle of nowhere, wondering what is happening.
  • You are the one who gets murdered, and you hunt these hills as an angry ghost till the end of time.
  • You are the old Little Red Riding Hood, and you just shot the wolf again.
  • You are the wolf, shooting grandma.
  • You are a piece of art.
  • You are the villain.

The Noise is more a creative experiment than an actual game, don't take it too seriously...
